Definition.WordDefinition: Vega, TX (town, FIPS 75188) Location: 35.24658 N, 102.42593 W Population (1990): 840 (388 housing units) Area: 2.7 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 79092

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Vega \Ve"ga\ (v[=e]"g[.a]), n. (Astron.) [Ar. w[=a]gi', properly, falling: cf. F. W['e]ga.] A brilliant star of the first magnitude, the brightest of those constituting the constellation Lyra. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Vega \Ve"ga\, n. [Sp.] An open tract of ground; a plain, esp. one which is moist and fertile, as those used for tobacco fields. [Sp. Amer. & Phil. Islands] [Webster 1913 Suppl.]
Vega n 1: prolific Spanish playwright (1562-1635) [syn: {Lope de Vega}, {Lope Felix de Vega Carpio}] 2: the brightest star in the constellation Lyra
